name: NWProtocolWebSocket
desc: A network protocol for connections that use WebSocket.

items.name: class NWProtocolWebSocket.Options
items.desc: A container of options for configuring how WebSocket is used on a connection.

items.name: static let definition: NWProtocolDefinition
items.desc: The system definition of the WebSocket protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolWebSocket.Metadata
items.desc: A WebSocket message you configure when sending and receiving packets.
